item.title: Word Alerts Report
item.description: name: word_alerts fullname: Word Alerts Report description: >The word alerts template summarizes daily chief complaints and discharge diagnosis term alerts for a selected syndrome definition. Original Code By: Michael Sheppard. Adapted to the Rnssp Package by: Gbedegnon Roseric Azondekon. National Syndromic Surveillance Program (NSSP). Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). create_dir: true Detailed Description The Word Alerts Report template (word_alerts) summarizes daily chief complaints and discharge diagnosis term alerts for a selected syndrome definition.
